  • Method Details

    • spendEnergy

      public boolean spendEnergy()
      Decreases the energy level of the Tamagotchi by 2 and the fun level by 1, and checks whether the energy and fun levels have fallen below 0. If either energy or fun level is less than or equal to 0, the Tamagotchi is considered to be knocked out and the method returns false. Otherwise, the method returns true.
      Overrides:
      spendEnergy in class Tamagoshi
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether the Tamagotchi has energy and fun levels greater than 0 after the energy is spent.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Tamagotchi, including its name, age, type, remaining lifetime, maximum energy level, and current energy level.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Tamagoshi
      Returns:
      a string representation of the Tamagotchi, including its attributes

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Returns a string representing the type of the Tamagotchi, which is "gros mangeur".
      Overrides:
      getType in class Tamagoshi
      Returns:
      a string representing the type of the Tamagotchi
